title: Plaion Plaier
itunes:title: Plaion Plaier
description:
This week's major subjects include the freestanding toilet in Vinny's basement and perhaps the most horrifying image ever put to a web page. Also, uh, video games! Stuff like Cult of the Lamb, Farthest Frontier, Hindsight, Spider-Man on PC, further adventures in Elden Ring, the long-buried Super Punch-Out two-player mode, a bit of an EVO wrap-up, terrible golf puns, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:02) Show rundown
(00:01:25) Going on at Nextlander
(00:05:46) The basement toilet
(00:13:04) Alex's EVO tales
(00:22:32) The Games
(00:22:40) Cult of the Lamb [Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 11, 2022
(00:31:31) First Break
(00:31:35) Farthest Frontier [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 09, 2022
(00:39:17) SimCity
(00:42:12) Hindsight [Nintendo Switch, iOS, Mac, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 04, 2022
(00:48:58) Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Aug 12, 2022
(00:55:22) Into the Breach [Android, iOS] on Jul 19, 2022
(01:01:15) Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course Pass [Nintendo Switch] on Mar 18, 2022
(01:04:42) Elden Ring [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5] on Feb 25, 2022
(01:15:24) Second Break
(01:15:29) News
(01:15:45) Super Punch-Out has a two-player mode?!
(01:22:21) Marvel's Midnight Suns delayed
(01:26:16) Everybody's Golf has some new titles
(01:32:09) Koch Media's new name
(01:35:27) A new Pac-Man movie?
(01:41:43) Emails
(01:51:06) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:51:35) Mysterious Benefactor Tiers Shoutouts
(01:53:07) Nextlander Content Updates
(01:54:59) See ya!
